alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 9:54AM CDT until October 31 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch in extreme southwest Douglas County. * WHERE...Douglas County. * WHEN...Until noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Extreme southwest Douglas County will be impacted by a band of moderate to heavy snow through late morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
